text: Mural on Our Street is a 1965 American short documentary film directed by Dee Dee Halleck. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== *List of American films of 1965 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1965 films Category:1965 short films Category:1960s documentary films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: Mural on Our Street
